item.title: Paring down with AMP
item.description: This is a post about my experience of simplifying my page down to an AMP page. My philosophy was incremental improvement using the validator and lighthouse test. The result is an excellent lighthouse score, fundamentals: Steps TODO: Size bounding inline CSS Cutting down Devices.css Super Tiny Icons Service Worker
